quote: 每個孩子都是藝術家，問題在於如何在長大後仍然保持藝術家的身份。(Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.)
author: 巴勃羅·畢卡索 (Pablo Picasso)

quote: 藝術的目的不是表現事物的外表，而是其內在的意義。(The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.)
author: 巴勃羅·畢卡索 (Pablo Picasso) (此為他另一句名言，強調藝術淨化心靈)

quote: 創造力就是犯錯的勇氣。(Creativity is the courage to make mistakes.)
author: 不詳 (常被引用，但確切出處待考)

quote: 沒有偉大的藝術家看見事物真正的樣子。如果他看見了，他就不是藝術家了。(No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.)
author: 奧斯卡·王爾德 (Oscar Wilde)

quote: 想像力比知識更重要，因為知識是有限的，而想像力概括著世界上的一切，推動著進步，並且是知識進化的泉源。(Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.)
author: 阿爾伯特·愛因斯坦 (Albert Einstein)
work: 科學家的藝術觀 (之前在 tech-innovation 中也適用)

quote: 藝術家唯一的職責就是忠於自己的夢想。(The artist's only responsibility is to his dream.)
author: 奧諾雷·德·巴爾扎克 (Honoré de Balzac)

quote: 所謂原創，並非指第一個想到某個點子的人，而是指那個使點子真正實現並廣為人知的人。(Originality is not seen in being the first to think of an idea, but in being the first to make it widely known and truly implemented.)
author: 不詳 (常見的創新觀點)

quote: 藝術並不複製可見的事物，而是使事物變得可見。(Art does not reproduce the visible; rather, it makes visible.)
author: 保羅·克利 (Paul Klee)

quote: 如果你聽到內心有個聲音說『你畫不出來』，那麼無論如何你都要去畫，那個聲音就會沉默。(If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.)
author: 文森特·梵谷 (Vincent van Gogh)

quote: 靈感確實存在，但它必須在你工作時找到你。(Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.)
author: 巴勃羅·畢卡索 (Pablo Picasso)

quote: 繪畫是無言的詩，詩是有言的畫。(Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.)
author: 普魯塔克 (Plutarch) / 西蒙尼德斯 (Simonides)
work: 古希臘思想，比較藝術形式

quote: 好的藝術家複製，偉大的藝術家偷竊。(Good artists copy, great artists steal.)
author: 巴勃羅·畢卡索 (Pablo Picasso) / 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs) 等多人引用

quote: 藝術的敵人是缺乏限制。(The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.)
author: 奧森·威爾斯 (Orson Welles)

quote: 所有藝術在本質上都是自傳。(All art is autobiographical; the pearl is the oyster's autobiography.)
author: 費德里柯·費里尼 (Federico Fellini)

quote: 寫作的藝術就是發現你所相信的東西的藝術。(The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.)
author: 古斯塔夫·福樓拜 (Gustave Flaubert)

quote: 藝術家就像一個容器，接收來自四面八方的情感——來自天空，來自大地，來自一張紙片，來自一個路過的人影，來自一張蜘蛛網。(An artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider's web.)
author: 巴勃羅·畢卡索 (Pablo Picasso)

quote: 如果沒有音樂，生活將是一個錯誤。(Without music, life would be a mistake.)
author: 弗里德里希·尼采 (Friedrich Nietzsche)

quote: 藝術的偉大之處在於找到一種將個人經驗轉化為普世經驗的方式。(The great thing about art is that it finds a way to transform personal experience into universal experience.)
author: 宮崎駿 (Hayao Miyazaki) (類似觀點)
work: 動畫大師對藝術的理解

quote: 每一個設計上的決定，如果不是讓它更有用，就不要做。(Every design decision, if it's not making it more useful, then don't do it.)
author: 迪特·拉姆斯 (Dieter Rams)
work: 工業設計大師，設計十誡

quote: 不要等待靈感，要去追求它，帶著棍棒。(Don't wait for inspiration. Go after it with a club.)
author: 傑克·倫敦 (Jack London)

quote: 藝術是唯一嚴肅的事情。但藝術家是唯一不嚴肅的人。(Art is the only serious thing in the world. And the artist is the only person who is never serious.)
author: 奧斯卡·王爾德 (Oscar Wilde)
work: 對藝術與藝術家的反諷

quote: 一個藝術家永遠不應該成為他自己時代的囚徒。(An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success.)
author: 亨利·馬蒂斯 (Henri Matisse)

quote: 形式追隨功能。(Form follows function.)
author: 路易斯·蘇利文 (Louis Sullivan)

quote: 藝術中最困難的部分是知道何時停止。(The hardest part of art is knowing when to stop.)
author: 不詳 (畫家、作家中流傳的觀點)

quote: 創造力是智慧在玩耍。(Creativity is intelligence having fun.)
author: 阿爾伯特·愛因斯坦 (Albert Einstein) (常被歸功於他)

quote: 藝術的魅力在於它能讓我們看到熟悉事物的陌生面。(The charm of art is that it allows us to see the unfamiliar side of familiar things.)
author: 村上春樹 (Haruki Murakami) (類似觀點)

quote: 如果你想寫作，就去寫。沒有什麼『作家區塊』這種東西，只有『不想寫作的作家』。(If you want to write, write. There's no such thing as 'writer's block.' There are only 'writers who don't want to write.')
author: 不詳 (對作家瓶頸的犀利觀點)

quote: 藝術應該安慰不安的人，並擾亂安逸的人。(Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.)
author: 塞薩爾·克魯茲 (Cesar A. Cruz) / 班克斯 (Banksy) (常被引用)

quote: 細節不是細節，它們造就了設計。(The details are not the details. They make the design.)
author: 查爾斯·伊姆斯 (Charles Eames)

quote: 藝術是人類的天性。(Art is a human性の自然な現れである。 - Art is a natural expression of human nature.)
author: 宮崎駿 (Hayao Miyazaki)
